name: millionaire
description: Who Wants to Be a Millionaire web app

scripts.clean_prod: npm run build && node app.js data_level:prod
scripts.clean_prod_info: npm run build && node app.js data_level:prod debug:info
scripts.clean_prod_warn: npm run build && node app.js data_level:prod debug:warn
scripts.clean_prod_error: npm run build && node app.js data_level:prod debug:error
scripts.clean_dev: npm run build && node app.js data_level:dev
scripts.clean_dev_info: npm run build && node app.js data_level:dev debug:info
scripts.clean_dev_warn: npm run build && node app.js data_level:dev debug:warn
scripts.clean_dev_error: npm run build && node app.js data_level:dev debug:error
